mapper.select: select t3.aid as id, t3.aname as authorityName from authority t3 where t3.asortNum > ( SELECT MAX(t2.asortNum) FROM e_a_relation t1,authority t2 where t1.aid=t2.aid and t1.eid=#{userID} )

SELECT
date_format(t1.ehiredate,'%Y-%m-%d') as ehiredate, t1.*,GROUP_CONCAT(t3.aname) as authority
count(distinct t1.eid) as sum
FROM employee t1,e_a_relation t2,authority t3 WHERE t1.eid = t2.eid and t3.aid = t2.aid
and ename like '$%{name}%'
and eaccount = #{account}
limit ${startNum},${pageLength}
